excerpt.rendered:
Ginger Lemon Lip Balm

Like sipping fresh cut ginger tea flavoured with the zest of lemon, this gorgeous balm combines locally produced ginger root essential oil with pure lemon and lemon myrtle essential oils, guaranteed to give your lips a seductive glisten and your kisses a citrusy punch!

You can buy this product here: Shopalila
